content.text:
# IIFA Award for Most Glamorous Star of the Year

The IIFA Glamour Star of the Year Award is a special award given to those who are found to be the most glamorous stars of that year.
The winners are listed below:
{| cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" width="50%"
|- bgcolor="#d1e4fd"
! Year || Winner
|-
| 2006 || Preity Zinta
|- bgcolor=#edf3fe
| 2007|| Aishwarya Rai and Hrithik Roshan
|}
See also
* IIFA Awards
* Bollywood
* Cinema of India
